GSD.description:
usb: gadget: f_ncm: fix potential NULL ptr deref in ncm_bitrate()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.8 by commit 09e4507ec8ef2d44da6ba4092b8ee2d81f216497. For more details please see the references link.
